query:
UPDATE team_members SET 
  employeeId = CONCAT('EMP', LPAD(id, 4, '0')),
  name = CASE 
    WHEN id = 1 THEN 'Md. Sohel Sikder'
    WHEN id = 2 THEN 'Sarah Johnson'
    WHEN id = 3 THEN 'Ahmed Hassan'
    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'Emily Davis'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'Michael Chen'
    ELSE CONCAT('Employee ', id)
  END,
  email = CASE 
    WHEN id = 1 THEN 'md.sohel13@gmail.com'
    WHEN id = 2 THEN 'sarah.johnson@company.com'
    WHEN id = 3 THEN 'ahmed.hassan@company.com'
    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'emily.davis@company.com'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'michael.chen@company.com'
    ELSE CONCAT('employee', id, '@company.com')
  END,
  phone = CONCAT('+880', LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 9000000000), 10, '0')),
  department = CASE 
    WHEN id IN (1, 2) THEN 'Operations'
    WHEN id IN (3, 4) THEN 'Finance'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'HR'
    ELSE 'General'
  END,
  designation = CASE 
    WHEN id = 1 THEN 'Director'
    WHEN id = 2 THEN 'Manager'
    WHEN id = 3 THEN 'Senior Analyst'
    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'Analyst'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'HR Specialist'
    ELSE 'Staff'
  END,
  joiningDate = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL FLOOR(RAND() * 365) DAY),
  salary = FLOOR(RAND() * 50000) + 30000,
  status = 'active',
  createdBy = 1;

UPDATE team_members SET 
  employeeId = CONCAT('EMP', LPAD(id, 4, '0')),

    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'Emily Davis'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'Michael Chen'
    ELSE CONCAT('Employee ', id)

    WHEN id = 3 THEN 'ahmed.hassan@company.com'
    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'emily.davis@company.com'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'michael.chen@company.com'
    ELSE CONCAT('employee', id, '@company.com')
  END,
  phone = CONCAT('+880', LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 9000000000), 10, '0')),
  department = CASE 
    WHEN id IN (1, 2) THEN 'Operations'
    WHEN id IN (3, 4) THEN 'Finance'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'HR'
    ELSE 'General'
  END,
  designation = CASE 
    WHEN id = 1 THEN 'Director'
    WHEN id = 2 THEN 'Manager'
    WHEN id = 3 THEN 'Senior Analyst'
    WHEN id = 4 THEN 'Analyst'
    WHEN id = 5 THEN 'HR Specialist'
    ELSE 'Staff'
  END,
  joiningDate = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL FLOOR(RAND() * 365) DAY),

  status = 'active',
  createdBy = 1;
